author: jdillon
msg: Adding ServerProxy helper to facilitate checking if the server is loaded
Unfortunately I was not able to figure out how to do this with JMX alone, so we need to depend on geronimo-kernel to pick up classes

author: craigmcc
msg: Update legacy configuration resource parsing to automatically parse the
default resource (/WEB-INF/dialog-config.xml), if it exists, even if it
was not explicitly called out in a context init parameter.

author: felicity
msg: try to simplify URIDNSBL a bit -- just use PMS to store data instead of some hash w/ multiple excess reference pointers, etc.

author: felicity
msg: instead of trying to delete specific names out of objects which may cause circular references, just go ahead and remove all entries from the self hash in finish() -- the object is expected to go away after finish() is called, so this shouldn't be an issue.

author: wrowe
msg: Add more ignores when building under VC 2005, we create these
binaries which have a corresponding .manifest to invoke them.
